entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 20 at 3:04PM PST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER WILL RESULT IN MAJOR TRAVEL DISRUPTIONS MID WEEK THROUGH THE HOLIDAY WEEKEND... There will be few meaningful breaks in the weather for the Sierra once the storms begin late Tuesday so plan ahead.

entry.summary: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Mainland Monroe and Miami-Dade Counties through 1030 AM EST...
